name: Physics
description: Physicists are physicists who concentrate on experiments to expand and refine the theories applicable to electronics.

name: Chemistry
description: Chemistry is a scientific discipline that involves the study of reactions with substances, their composition, properties, and other elements. An object is something that has mass and acquires space.

name: Mathematics
description: Mathematics is a field of knowledge that studies numbers, formulas, structures, shapes, places, quantities and their variations. Mathematics is all around us, in everything we do.

name: Biology
description: Biology is a branch of science that focuses on the study of human evolution, genetics, the origin of life, chemical bonding, atomic structure, and cell biology.

name: Computer Science
description: A degree in Computer Science focuses on the theoretical foundations of computation and information along with taking a practical approach to the applications of computation.

name: Microbiology
description: Microbiology is the study of unicellular, multicellular and ascellular microorganisms and their respective effects and contributions to the environment.
